lead_paragraph: Devils forward Scott Gomez was awarded a one-year, $5 million contract by an arbitrator yesterday. Gomez posted career highs in goals (33) and points (84) last season, when he made $2.204 million. The Devils have 48 hours to accept the ruling and sign Gomez or let him become an unrestricted free agent.
